content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to execute a Python file named "dalle_image_generator.py." My latest action was to receive a command to execute a Python file named "dalle_image_generator.py" with the arguments of "filename".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_python_file returned: Error: File '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/dalle_image_generator.py' does not exist."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "dalle_image_generator.py", "text": "# Import necessary libraries\\nimport openai\\nimport requests\\nimport json\\nimport base64\\nfrom PIL import Image\\n\\n# Set up API key\\nopenai.api_key = \\"YOUR_API_KEY\\"\\n\\n# Define function to generate image from text prompt\\n\\ndef generate_image(prompt):\\n    response = openai.Completion.create(\\n        engine=\\"image-alpha-001\\",\\n        prompt=prompt,\\n        max_tokens=64,\\n        n=1,\\n        stop=None,\\n        temperature=0.5,\\n    )\\n    image_data = response.choices[0].text\\n    image_data = image_data.replace(\\"data:image/png;base64,\\", \\"\\")\\n    image_bytes = base64.b64decode(image_data)\\n    image = Image.open(io.BytesIO(image_bytes))\\n    return image\\n"}}}'}]
"""
